hello.text: {i}A red head girl enters in the office carrying with pain two unconscious bodies, then leaves{s}

how.text: Numb. Pains a lot. What happened ?

what.text: Yatsuhashi: The last thing we remember is playing at the concert with Raiko. Where is she ?
Benben: The last thing I remember is seeing a white flash coming from her

scanner.text: {i}Nothing broken but you can find out the damage traces a line, as if something traversed their body.{s}

painkillers.text: {i}This should calm them down and make it less painful{s}
{i}You've already given them some. Some more could be a bad idea seeing their state{s}

medicine.text: {i}The cure all begins to kick in and wakes them up{s}
